name: Multiplicative.existsMulOfLe
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝² : Add α
inst✝¹ : LE α
inst✝ : ExistsAddOfLE α
⊢ ExistsMulOfLE (Multiplicative α)
decl:
instance Multiplicative.existsMulOfLe [Add α] [LE α] [ExistsAddOfLE α] :
    ExistsMulOfLE (Multiplicative α) :=
  ⟨@exists_add_of_le α _ _ _⟩

name: Additive.existsAddOfLe
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝² : Mul α
inst✝¹ : LE α
inst✝ : ExistsMulOfLE α
⊢ ExistsAddOfLE (Additive α)
decl:
instance Additive.existsAddOfLe [Mul α] [LE α] [ExistsMulOfLE α] : ExistsAddOfLE (Additive α) :=
  ⟨@exists_mul_of_le α _ _ _⟩

name: Additive.ofMul_le
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : Preorder α
a b : α
⊢ Iff (LE.le (Additive.ofMul a) (Additive.ofMul b)) (LE.le a b)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem ofMul_le {a b : α} : ofMul a ≤ ofMul b ↔ a ≤ b :=
  Iff.rfl

name: Additive.ofMul_lt
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : Preorder α
a b : α
⊢ Iff (LT.lt (Additive.ofMul a) (Additive.ofMul b)) (LT.lt a b)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem ofMul_lt {a b : α} : ofMul a < ofMul b ↔ a < b :=
  Iff.rfl

name: Additive.toMul_le
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : Preorder α
a b : Additive α
⊢ Iff (LE.le (Additive.toMul a) (Additive.toMul b)) (LE.le a b)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem toMul_le {a b : Additive α} : a.toMul ≤ b.toMul ↔ a ≤ b :=
  Iff.rfl

name: Additive.toMul_lt
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : Preorder α
a b : Additive α
⊢ Iff (LT.lt (Additive.toMul a) (Additive.toMul b)) (LT.lt a b)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem toMul_lt {a b : Additive α} : a.toMul < b.toMul ↔ a < b :=
  Iff.rfl

name: Additive.toMul_mono
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : Preorder α
a b : Additive α
a✝ : LE.le a b
⊢ LE.le (Additive.toMul a) (Additive.toMul b)

name: Additive.ofMul_mono
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : Preorder α
a b : α
a✝ : LE.le a b
⊢ LE.le (Additive.ofMul a) (Additive.ofMul b)

name: Additive.toMul_strictMono
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : Preorder α
a b : Additive α
a✝ : LT.lt a b
⊢ LT.lt (Additive.toMul a) (Additive.toMul b)

name: Additive.foMul_strictMono
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : Preorder α
a b : α
a✝ : LT.lt a b
⊢ LT.lt (Additive.ofMul a) (Additive.ofMul b)
